title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-1.3 - Date of submission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-1.3 - Date of submission

State Regulations
(a) The
institutional plan and proposal for funds under the provisions of section 6451
shall be transmitted to the Commissioner of Education or his/her designee, by
the date specified in the announcement of funding. (b) The date of submission may be modified by
the Commissioner of Education or his/her designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
152-1.3

Amended

New

York State Register September 27, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 39, eff. 9/27/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
